text:
After stepping away from this for a few hours yesterday, I realized that almost all of the information I need is available via the pages API.

I’m basically getting dependents backwards now.  I list all the files and then the modules they are built with, then I can sort by module to see which pages they are used in.  I also the “recipe” for each page, which is very handy.

The only piece I’m missing now is listing modules that aren’t used in any modules.
